page.title: 03Housing(cont.)
page.content:
ome people like a terraced house, With a bright painted door, And a rambling rose, And friendly neighbours, And open fires, And a pigeon-loft in the yard.
Weston Turville Houses. Some of the houses in Weston Turville show the local history.There is the old manor house near the Norman church, which dates back to Georgian times. There are examples of 16th century thatched cottages which once belonged to farm workers. There are Victorian houses such as the old rectory in the village. Weston Turville is still continuing to grow, with all types of housing being built.There are examples of detached houses,semi-detached houses, maisonettes and council houses in the village.
